About Welcome to Tourify, your go-to website for booking tours and excursions around the world! At Tourify, we believe that travel is not just about visiting a new destination, but truly immersing yourself in the local culture and experiences. That's why we have curated a selection of handpicked tours and activities that will allow you to discover the hidden gems of every place you visit. Whether you're looking for a guided city tour, a thrilling adventure activity, a culinary experience or a relaxing day trip, Tourify has something for everyone. Our platform features a wide range of tours, from popular landmarks to off-the-beaten-path attractions, all led by knowledgeable and friendly local guides. Booking a tour with Tourify is simple and hassle-free. Just browse through our website, select the tour that interests you, choose your preferred date and time, and make a secure online payment. You will receive instant confirmation of your booking, along with all the details you need for a memorable experience. We understand that flexibility is important when it comes to travel plans, which is why we offer easy cancellation and rescheduling options for most of our tours. Our customer support team is also available around the clock to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have. With Tourify, you can rest assured that you are booking with a trusted and reliable platform. All our tour operators and guides are carefully vetted to ensure the highest standards of service and professionalism. Your safety and satisfaction are our top priorities. So why wait? Start planning your next adventure with Tourify today! Whether you're exploring the ancient ruins of Machu Picchu, cruising through the pristine waters of the Great Barrier Reef, or tasting the flavors of a bustling food market in Bangkok, we have the perfect tour for you. Join the thousands of travelers who have already experienced the world with Tourify. Book your next tour with us and create memories that will last a lifetime. Happy travels! pages.policy: Tourify: Privacy Policy Cities Excursions About Sign up Privacy Policy Welcome to Tourify! We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy is designed to inform you about how we collect, use, and disclose your information when you use our website or services. Information We Collect When you visit our website or use our services, we may collect personal information about you. This information may include your name, email address, phone number, billing address, credit card details, and other information that you provide to us. We may also collect information about your device, such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, and other technical information. This information helps us to improve our website and services, and to provide you with a better user experience. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect to provide you with the services you have requested, such as booking excursions and tours. We may also use your information to communicate with you, respond to your inquiries, and send you updates about our services. We may use your information for marketing purposes, such as sending you promotional offers and newsletters. If you do not wish to receive these communications, you can opt out at any time by contacting us or unsubscribing from our emails. Disclosure of Information We may disclose your information to third parties who provide services on our behalf, such as payment processors, booking agencies, and tour operators. These third parties are required to protect your information and are only allowed to use it for the purpose of providing their services to us. We may also disclose your information if required by law or to protect our rights or the rights of our users. In the event of a merger or acquisition, your information may be transferred to the new owners of our business. Security of Your Information We take the security of your information seriously and take measures to protect it from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. We use encryption, firewalls, and other security measures to safeguard your information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, so we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information. You are responsible for keeping your password confidential and for taking precautions to protect your personal information. Children's Privacy Our website and services are not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children, and if we become aware that we have collected information from a child, we will take steps to delete that information. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time, so please review it periodically. If we make any material changes to this policy, we will notify you by email or by posting a notice on our website. Your continued use of our website or services after such changes will constitute your acceptance of the updated policy. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at Tourify@gmail.com We will respond to your inquiry as soon as possible. Last updated: January 1, 2022 Thank you for choosing Tourify! We are committed to protecting your privacy and providing you with a secure and enjoyable experience.
